duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify improvement opportunities and lead the Focused Improvement efforts in their area.
Analyze existing processes for cost savings, reliability, and performance improvement opportunities.
Interact with maintenance, controls, process, and quality personnel in planning for and the development of process improvements.
Assist in day to day operations including shift coverage as needed.
Manage personnel and work closely across company job functions.
Ability to look beyond the task at hand, anticipate challenges, and develop options to overcome them.
Gaining general knowledge of codes, relevant standards, and materials/metallurgy related to equipment and processes assigned.
Effective interaction with multiple employees and managers to prioritize demands.
Continuous improvement utilizing independent judgment to solve problems and have excellent organizational skills in order to effectively handle multiple ongoing tasks.
Proactive participation in safety, environmental, and quality activities is expected to ensure compliance with all company policies and procedures.
Assist in developing colleagues through training, technical support mentoring, development of pilot operating equipment.

education_certification.credential: Ability to manage personnel and work closely across company job functions.
Effective interaction with multiple employees and managers to prioritize demands.
Proactive participation in safety, environmental, and quality activities is expected to ensure compliance with all company policies and procedures.
